description:
This expansion contains two additional maps  - Corsica and Gallia, that add variety and new challenges to the game: 

Corsica is a small 20 City, 8 Province map where Prefects provide bonus gold.
Gallia is a 25 City, 10 Province map where players face the challenges of crossing the English Channel and navigating the river Sienne and securing Harbors to sail past the Mediterranean Sea!

Take to the seas and face new challenges in your Concordia games today!
name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Corsica & Gallia
